message.body: Sorry I've been so MIA. I have instructor meetings on Tuesday and office hours on Wed and Thurs for the class I'm teaching this month! But hope to see you soon. Also ####### (that game I play) is coming out for iPhone probably within the next week. If you are interested I'll give you a run through. But you have to join the ################### team :)

I'm sorry too. I'm in NC on vacay at the moment. Heading back to Phila late Mon or early Tue. Next wknd I'm in DC for a wedding shower. It's been a busy summer! Check ur schedule and let me know if any days work next week for getting together.
